Incorporate: - Learning Objectives: [Paste full list here] - Scaffolding Layers: [Paste full layers here] - Active Learning: Tie explanations to discussion/peer teaching/problems. - Research Context: Trust zones (logical segments with implicit trust), enforcement (controls/verification), missing enforcement risks (implicit trust, lateral movement, attack surface, insider threats), NIST Zero Trust (SP 800-207). Follow Flashcard Schema exactly: - 40% Layer 1/2 (Remember/Understand), 30% Layer 3 (Apply/Analyze), 30% Layer 4 (Evaluate/Create). - Output JSON array: [{'front': '...', 'back': {'correct_answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'distractors_explained': [...], 'related_objective': '...', 'hint': '...', 'layer': 1}}, ...] - Ensure distractors per protocol; explanations per requirements. - Vary question types: 60% MCQ, 20% cloze, 20% short answer. - Promote active recall: No peeking cues.
